Acne is often caused by excess oil production, clogged pores, bacteria, and hormonal changes. Prevent it by washing your face regularly, avoiding oily foods, and keeping your skin hydrated.
To keep your skin hydrated, drink plenty of water, use a good moisturizer, and avoid harsh soaps that strip away natural oils.
